input.sentences: the family gathering was so much fun .
we took lost of pictures to remember the great moments .
the babies were just as happy as we were .
we all had fun talking to each other and spending time together .
we would never forget how wonderful it was to be together .
output.sentences: I recently attended a family reunion.
I got to see my sister and her husband.
I got to see my cousin and her new baby for the first time.
We sat outside and enjoyed the nice weather.
My brother brought his new girlfriend along.
